title: Health is Wealth
narration: Swasthya hi sabse bada dhan hai. Yeh ek aisi sachhai hai jise hum aksar sunte hain lekin iske mahatva ko samajhna bahut zaroori hai. Is video mein hum dekhenge ki kaise achchha swasthya hamare jeevan ko behtar bana sakta hai.

title: Physical Health
content:
Regular Exercise
Balanced Diet
Adequate Sleep
image_desc: Person exercising, healthy food, person sleeping. Type: collage
narration: Sharirik swasthya ka matlab hai ki hamara shareer sahi tarah se kaam kare. Iske liye zaroori hai ki hum niyamit roop se vyayam karein santulit aahar lein aur paryapt neend lein. Vyayam se hamari manspeshiyan mazboot hoti hain aahar se shareer ko poshan milta hai aur neend se shareer ko aaram milta hai.

title: Mental Health
content:
Stress Management
Positive Thinking
Social Connections
image_desc: Person meditating, group of friends laughing, person journaling. Type: collage
narration: Mansik swasthya bhi utna hi mahatvapurna hai jitna ki sharirik swasthya. Tanav ko kam karne ke tareeke dhoondhna sakaratmak soch rakhna aur samajik sambandh banaye rakhna mansik swasthya ke liye zaroori hai. Dosto aur parivar ke saath samay bitana aur apne shauk ko pura karna bhi mansik shanti ke liye mahatvapurna hai.

title: The Importance of Prevention
image_desc: Doctor examining patient, vaccine injection, healthy lifestyle choices. Type: collage
narration: Bimariyon se bachav unke ilaaj se behtar hai. Niyamit roop se doctor se jaanch karwana tika lagwana aur swasth aadatain apnana bimariyon se bachne ke liye zaroori hai. Smoking se bachna sharab ka sevan kam karna aur swasth bhojan khana aapko lambe samay tak swasth rakh sakta hai.

title: Health is an Investment
content: Investing in your health leads to a happier and more productive life.
image_desc: Person smiling and working. Type: stock photo
narration: Apne swasthya mein nivesh karna ek behtar bhavishya mein nivesh karne jaisa hai. Jab aap swasth hote hain toh aap khush aur adhik utpadak hote hain. Isliye apne swasthya ko hamesha prathamikta dein.
